thread.title: Victoria’s Secret Pink: Model Daniela Lopez depends on one hot guy to keep her fit | DailyTelegraph
thread.title_full: Victoria’s Secret Pink: Model Daniela Lopez depends on one hot guy to keep her fit | DailyTelegraph

author: Kirsten Flemming
title: Victoria’s Secret Pink: Model Daniela Lopez depends on one hot guy to keep her fit | DailyTelegraph
text:
WHEN Christopher Kadima was playing professional basketball in France, the handsome 193cm shooting guard was approached by a modelling agent who thought the Frenchman could have a career on the catwalk.
It was dabbling in modelling and acting that would cement his future — albeit in an unexpected way. Mr Kadima is now the go-to trainer for some of the industry’s hottest bodies, including Victoria’s Secret Pink’s newest face, Daniela Lopez, and Xenia Deli, who starred in Justin Bieber’s video “What Do You Mean?”
Basic squat with side lift. Picture: Anne Wermiel.
Lunge with bicep curl. Picture: Anne Wermiel
